00010 /**
00011  * http-request class that does GET and POST (and even SSL) and has no dependencies
00012  *
00013  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00014  * @package kata
00015  *
00016  * Kata - Lightweight MVC Framework <http://www.codeninja.de/>
00017  * Copyright 2007-2008, mnt@codeninja.de
00018  *
00019  * Licensed under The GPL License
00020  * Redistributions of files must retain the above copyright notice.
00021  */
00022 class HttpUtility {
00023 
00024              private $returnHeaders;
00025 
00026              const TYPE_GET=1;
00027              const TYPE_POST=2;
00028              const TYPE_HEAD=3;
00029 
00030              /**
00031               * do a GET request to given url. you dont have to encode get-parameters, just give it as array
00032               *
00033               * @param string $url base-url to request to eg. http://example.com/foo/bar
00034               * @param array $getVars optional get-parameters to append to url
00035               * @param array $headers optional request-headers to add to request
00036               * @return mixed returns html or false if something went wrong (then ask lastError())
00037               */
00038              public function get($url, $getVars= false, $headers= false) {
00039                           return $this->doRequest(self::TYPE_GET, $url, $getVars, false, $headers);
00040              }
00041 
00042              /**
00043               * do a HEAD request to given url. you dont have to encode get-parameters, just give it as array
00044               *
00045               * @param string $url base-url to request to eg. http://example.com/foo/bar
00046               * @param array $getVars optional get-parameters to append to url
00047               * @param array $headers optional request-headers to add to request
00048               * @return mixed returns html or false if something went wrong (then ask lastError())
00049               */
00050              public function head($url, $getVars= false, $headers= false) {
00051                           return $this->doRequest(self::TYPE_HEAD, $url, $getVars, false, $headers);
00052              }
00053 
00054              /**
00055               * do a GET request to given url. you dont have to encode get-parameters, just give it as array
00056               *
00057               * @param string $url base-url to request to eg. http://example.com/foo/bar
00058               * @param array $getVars optional get-parameters to append to url
00059               * @param array $postVars optional post-parameters to add to request
00060               * @param array $headers optional request-headers to add to request
00061               * @return mixed returns html or false if something went wrong (then ask lastError())
00062               */
00063              public function post($url, $getVars= false, $postVars= false, $headers= false) {
00064                           return $this->doRequest(self::TYPE_POST, $url, $getVars, $postVars, $headers);
00065              }
00066 
00067              protected function doRequest($type, $url, $getVars, $postVars, $headers) {
00068                           if (false === $headers) {
00069                                        $headers= array ();
00070                           }
00071 
00072                           if ($type==self::TYPE_GET) {
00073                                        $params= array (
00074                                                     'http' => array (
00075                                                                  'method' => 'GET'
00076                                                     )
00077                                        );
00078                           }
00079 
00080                           if ($type==self::TYPE_HEAD) {
00081                                        $params= array (
00082                                                     'http' => array (
00083                                                                  'method' => 'HEAD'
00084                                                     )
00085                                        );
00086                           }
00087 
00088                           if ($type==self::TYPE_POST) {
00089                                        $postStr = http_build_query($postVars);
00090                                        $params= array (
00091                                                     'http' => array (
00092                                                                  'method' => 'POST',
00093                                                                  'content' => $postStr
00094                                                     )
00095                                        );
00096                                        $headers['Content-Type']='application/x-www-form-urlencoded';
00097                                        $headers['Content-Length'] = strlen($postStr);
00098                           }
00099 
00100                           if (is_array($getVars)) {
00101                                        $url .= '?'.http_build_query($getVars);
00102                           }
00103 
00104                           $headers['User-Agent']= 'kata httpUtility - http://codeninja.de';
00105 
00106                           $headerStr = '';
00107                           foreach ($headers as $name=>$value) {
00108                                        $headerStr.=$name.': '.$value."\r\n";
00109                           }
00110                           $params['http']['header']= $headerStr;
00111 
00112                           $context= stream_context_create($params);
00113                           $stream= @ fopen($url, 'rb', false, $context);
00114                           if (!$stream) {
00115                                        $this->returnHeaders= array (
00116                                                     'Status' => 404
00117                                        );
00118                                        return false;
00119                           }
00120 
00121                           $html= @ stream_get_contents($stream);
00122                           $headers = stream_get_meta_data($stream);
00123                           if (isset($headers['wrapper_data'])) {
00124                                        $this->returnHeaders=$this->parseHeaders($headers['wrapper_data']);
00125                           } else {
00126                                        $this->returnHeaders=$this->parseHeaders($headers);
00127                           }
00128 
00129                           if (false === $html) {
00130                                        fclose($stream);
00131                                        return false;
00132                           }
00133 
00134                           fclose($stream);
00135 
00136                           $status = $this->getStatus();
00137                           $location = isset($this->returnHeaders['Location'])?$this->returnHeaders['Location']:'';
00138                           switch ($status) {
00139                                        case 301:
00140                                        case 302:
00141                                        case 307:
00142                                                     return $this->doRequest($type,$location,$getVars,$postVars,$headers);
00143                                                     break;
00144                                        case 303:
00145                                                     return $this->doRequest($type==self::TYPE_POST?self::TYPE_GET:$type,$location,$getVars,$postVars,$headers);
00146                                                     break;
00147                           }
00148 
00149                           return $html;
00150              }
00151 
00152              /**
00153               * returns the http-status code of the last request. 0 if we could not figure out status-code
00154               *
00155               * @return int
00156               */
00157              public function getStatus() {
00158                           if (isset($this->returnHeaders['Status'])) {
00159                                        return $this->returnHeaders['Status'];
00160                           }
00161                           if (!empty($this->returnHeaders)) {
00162                                        $s = $this->returnHeaders[0];
00163                                        if (substr($s,0,4) == 'HTTP') {
00164                                                     $temp = explode(' ',$s);
00165                                                     return $temp[1];
00166                                        }
00167                           }
00168                           return 0;
00169              }
00170 
00171              /**
00172               * return all webserver-headers from the last request
00173               */
00174              public function getReturnHeaders() {
00175                           return is($this->returnHeaders, array ());
00176              }
00177 
00178              protected function parseHeaders($headers) {
00179                           $headOut = array();
00180                           foreach ($headers as $h) {
00181                                        $x = strpos($h,':');
00182                                        if ($x===false) {
00183                                                     $headOut[] = $h;
00184                                        } else {
00185                                                     $headOut[substr($h,0,$x)]=substr($h,$x+2);
00186                                        }
00187                           }
00188                           return $headOut;
00189              }
00190 }
